extensionDescription.message: Streamus turns YouTube into the music player you always wanted.

delete.description: Just the singular word, as seen on a button.

banUntilClear.description: Ban means don't allow showing/selection, remove semi-permanently. Clear is synonymous with empty.

clearStream.description: An action -- empty the stream of items

youTubePlayerErrorInvalidParameter.message: The request contains an invalid parameter value.

youTubePlayerErrorSongNotFound.message: Song requested is not found. This occurs when a song has been removed or it has been marked as private.

youTubePlayerErrorNoPlayEmbedded.message: Song requested does not allow playback in the embedded players.

working.description: An action -- Streamus is working/processing something

installed.description: Descriptor on a button, the state of Streamus is now 'installed'

highest.description: Descriptor for top tier quality, 100% highest audio quality. Seen in a drop-down.

auto.description: Descriptor for automatic quality selection. Seen in a drop-down.

lowest.description: Descriptor for lowest quality selection. Seen in a drop-down.

anIssueWasEncounteredWhileAddingYourPlay.message: An issue was encountered while adding your playlist. Check the URL?

streamusIsTakingALongTimeToLoadReloading.message: Streamus is taking a long time to load. Reloading may help.

areYouSureYouWantToDeletePlaylist.message: Are you sure you want to delete playlist
areYouSureYouWantToDeletePlaylist.description: This looks like a bit of a sentence fragment, but there's a playlist title which comes afterwards

areYouSureYouWantToClearYourStream.message: Are you sure you want to clear your stream?

typeToCreateOrFilterPlaylists.message: Type to create or filter playlists

channel.description: A noun -- as in a YouTube channel of music

remindClearStream.description: This is a bit of a sentence fragment. It is used as part of a list of reminders. e.g. 'Reminders:  - Remind clear stream'

remindDeletePlaylist.description: This is a bit of a sentence fragment. It is used as part of a list of reminders. e.g. 'Reminders:  - Remind delete playlist'

resultsWillAppearAsYouSearch.message: Results will appear as you search

anUpdateToStreamusIsAvailable.message: An update to Streamus is available

pleaseClickUpdateToReloadAndApplyTheUpda.message: Please click update to reload and apply the update

saveSongCommandDescription.message: Save the active song to the active playlist

nextSongCommandDescription.message: Go to the next song in the stream

previousSongCommandDescription.message: Go to the previous song in the stream

deleteSongCommandDescription.message: Remove the current song from the stream

copySongTitleUrlCommandDescription.message: Copy the current song's title and URL

cantGoBackToPreviousSong.message: Can't go back to previous song

whyNotAddASongFromAPlaylistOr.message: Why not add a song from a playlist or

linkAccountMessage.message: You're signed into Google, but you haven't linked your account to Streamus. You'll be able to access playlists from any computer if you link these accounts. Would you like to?

googleSignInMessage.message: It looks like you're not signed into Google. If you were, your Streamus playlists would be accessible from any computer.
